entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 60
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
MORE HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 50
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
